title: For any tax year
description: This endpoint allows the developer to list the submission periods associated with their UK property business for either or both of Furnished Holiday Letting (FHL) and Non FHL UK property or foreign property business for either or both of Furnished Holiday Letting (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA). A National Insurance number, tax year and business ID are required.

items.description: An array containing the submission periods associated with a property business.

submissionId.description: The unique identifier of the periodic submission.

fromDate.description: The first day that the income and expenses period summary covers. Must conform to the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

toDate.description: The last day that the income and expenses period summary covers. Must conform to the format: YYYY-MM-DD.
